statements: SELECT * FROM user_preferences WHERE user_id = 12345;
SELECT name, email FROM user_preferences WHERE strategy_id = 1;
SELECT name, investment_amount FROM user_preferences WHERE risk_tolerance = 'medium';
SELECT user_id, name, email, strategy_id FROM user_preferences WHERE risk_tolerance = 'high';
SELECT * FROM user_preferences WHERE investment_amount > 500.00;
SELECT * FROM user_preferences WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM user_preferences WHERE risk_tolerance = 'high';
SELECT user_id, name, investment_amount FROM user_preferences WHERE strategy_id = 5 ORDER BY investment_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_preferences WHERE risk_tolerance IN ('low', 'medium') ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT user_id, name, risk_tolerance FROM user_preferences WHERE investment_amount > 10000;
SELECT * FROM UserPreferences WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT risk_tolerance, investment_horizon FROM UserPreferences WHERE risk_tolerance = 'Low';
SELECT strategy_name, strategy_description, target_return FROM InvestmentStrategies WHERE target_return > 5.0;
SELECT strategy_name, min_investment_amount FROM InvestmentStrategies WHERE min_investment_amount >= 1000.0;
SELECT user_id, risk_tolerance, preferred_assets FROM UserPreferences WHERE risk_tolerance = 'High';
SELECT * FROM UserPreferences WHERE risk_tolerance = 'Medium';
SELECT user_id, preferred_assets FROM UserPreferences WHERE investment_horizon > 5 ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, risk_tolerance, investment_horizon FROM UserPreferences WHERE risk_tolerance LIKE '%High%';
SELECT * FROM UserPreferences WHERE investment_horizon BETWEEN 3 AND 7 ORDER BY investment_horizon ASC;
SELECT * FROM InvestmentStrategies WHERE min_investment_amount > 1000 ORDER BY target_return DESC;
SELECT * FROM UserPreferences;
SELECT user_id, preference_name FROM UserPreferences WHERE preference_value = 'high';
SELECT preference_name, preference_value FROM UserPreferences ORDER BY preference_name DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT user_id FROM UserStrategies;
SELECT strategy_id, strategy_name, target_roi FROM InvestmentStrategies WHERE target_roi > 5.00;
SELECT user_id, preference_name FROM UserPreferences WHERE preference_value = 'high';
SELECT * FROM InvestmentStrategies WHERE target_roi > 0.05 ORDER BY strategy_name DESC;
SELECT user_id, strategy_id, allocation FROM UserStrategies WHERE enabled = TRUE AND allocation >= 0.5;
SELECT user_id, preference_name, preference_value FROM UserPreferences WHERE user_id = 100 AND preference_name LIKE '%color%' ORDER BY preference_name ASC;
SELECT user_id, strategy_id, enabled FROM UserStrategies WHERE user_id = 50 ORDER BY enabled DESC, strategy_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_preferences;
SELECT username, email FROM user_preferences ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT investment_limit FROM user_preferences WHERE investment_limit > 1000;
SELECT * FROM automated_strategies WHERE strategy_type = 'Long-Term';
SELECT username, platform_name FROM user_preferences JOIN platform_settings ON user_preferences.user_id = platform_settings.setting_id;
SELECT * FROM user_preferences;
SELECT username, email, investment_limit FROM user_preferences WHERE investment_limit > 1000;
SELECT user_id, username FROM user_preferences ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT strategy_name, description FROM automated_strategies WHERE strategy_type = 'long-term';
SELECT platform_name, platform_url FROM platform_settings WHERE platform_url LIKE '%.com';
SELECT * FROM user_preferences;
SELECT user_id, preferred_currency, notification_settings FROM user_preferences ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, preferred_currency FROM user_preferences WHERE risk_tolerance > 5;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, transaction_date FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT platform_name, strategy_name, description FROM investment_strategies WHERE description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM user_preferences;
SELECT preferred_currency, notification_settings FROM user_preferences WHERE risk_tolerance > 3;
SELECT user_id, preferred_currency FROM user_preferences WHERE preferred_currency = 'USD';
SELECT strategy_name, description, creator_id FROM investment_strategies WHERE strategy_id = 2;
SELECT t.user_id, t.amount, u.username, p.platform_name FROM transactions t JOIN users u ON t.user_id = u.user_id JOIN platform_preferences p ON t.platform_id = p.platform_id WHERE t.amount > 1000;
